statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_tracking
SELECT vehicle_id, location FROM vehicle_tracking ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC
SELECT * FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT location, usage_time FROM vehicle_tracking ORDER BY usage_time ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, resource_allocated FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE resource_allocated = TRUE
SELECT * FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT location, usage_time FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE location LIKE '%New York%' ORDER BY usage_time DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM vehicle_tracking GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING total_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_tracking ORDER BY usage_time, location DESC;
SELECT AVG(usage_time) AS avg_usage_time, MAX(usage_time) AS max_usage_time FROM vehicle_tracking;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_data;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_id FROM vehicle_data;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_id FROM vehicle_data WHERE usage_pattern='Personal';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name FROM vehicle_data WHERE location_id=3;
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocation_date='2022-10-20';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_data WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name FROM vehicle_data WHERE location_id = 2 ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, allocation_date FROM vehicle_data JOIN resource_allocation ON vehicle_data.vehicle_id = resource_allocation.vehicle_id WHERE allocation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocated_resource LIKE '%fuel%';
SELECT COUNT(vehicle_id) AS total_vehicles, location_id FROM vehicle_data GROUP BY location_id ORDER BY total_vehicles DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type FROM Vehicle WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, vehicle_type, location FROM Vehicle ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE last_usage_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_name, usage_type FROM Vehicle INNER JOIN VehicleUsage ON Vehicle.id = VehicleUsage.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT vehicle_name, location FROM Vehicle WHERE last_usage_timestamp < NOW();
SELECT vehicle_name, MAX(last_usage_timestamp) AS last_usage FROM Vehicle GROUP BY vehicle_name;
SELECT v.vehicle_name, u.usage_type, u.duration_minutes FROM Vehicle v JOIN VehicleUsage u ON v.id = u.vehicle_id WHERE u.usage_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT va.allocation_timestamp, v.vehicle_name, va.allocated_for FROM Vehicle v JOIN ResourceAllocation va ON v.id = va.vehicle_id WHERE va.allocation_timestamp > '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM vehicle;
SELECT brand, model, year FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT driver_id, name, age FROM driver WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT trip_id, start_timestamp, end_timestamp, distance FROM trip WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY start_timestamp DESC;
SELECT allocation_id, trip_id, resource_type, resource_quantity FROM resource_allocation WHERE resource_quantity >= 5;
SELECT * FROM vehicle ORDER BY brand DESC, year ASC;
SELECT driver_id, name, age FROM driver WHERE age > 30;
SELECT trip_id, start_timestamp, end_timestamp, distance FROM trip WHERE distance > 1000 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, model FROM vehicle WHERE brand = 'Toyota';
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation WHERE resource_type = 'fuel' AND resource_quantity >= 10 ORDER BY resource_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE year = 2022
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, manufacturer, model FROM Vehicle ORDER BY manufacturer
SELECT * FROM Driver WHERE name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT trip_date, start_location, end_location FROM Trip WHERE distance_km > 100 ORDER BY trip_date DESC
SELECT record_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date, cost FROM Maintenance_Record WHERE cost < 500 ORDER BY maintenance_date
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2010
SELECT model, manufacturer FROM Vehicle ORDER BY manufacturer ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer, COUNT(*) FROM Maintenance_Record GROUP BY manufacturer, vehicle_id
SELECT DISTINCT manufacturer FROM Vehicle
SELECT Driver.name, Trip.trip_date, Vehicle.model FROM Driver JOIN Trip ON Driver.driver_id = Trip.driver_id JOIN Vehicle ON Trip.vehicle_id = Vehicle.vehicle_id
